name: ren-playground
description: A browser-based playground for Ren: a dynamically typed, functional scripting lanugage.

scripts.serve: rm -rf .parcel-cache docs && parcel watch src/index.html & npx http-server ./docs -c-1
scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache docs && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir docs --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --public-url https://ren-lang.github.io/playground
